greetings-enable: Greetings have been enabled. Set message and channel if you haven't already to get me to greet people.
greetings-noChan: No channel was found with the name `{{name}}`
greetings-noChanArgs: Please give me a channel to use for greetings.
greetings-setMsg: Successfully set greeting message. Sending test message.
greetings-noMsgArgs: Please give me something to use as a greeting.
greetings-example2:
Set the channel for greetings.
You can also mention the channel to set it.
greetings-example3:
Set the text for the greeting.
Will replace `{{user}}` with a mention of the user and
`{{name}}` with just the username and discriminator like `Username#0001`
